title: Best Papers Awards ICML 2008

author: Andrew McCallum, Department of Computer Science, University of Massachusetts Amherst

To have them to avoid having them compete with other papers.

It's been traditional in ICML to have two types of awards of best paper award and a best Student paper Award, and Sam and I decided together in conjunction with the International Machine Learning Society to add.

New new Awards 2 ICM else roster which are 10 year best paper award for the best paper of ICM L 10 years ago or of some other code located conference at the time and a best Application, Paper award and so these are to celebrate and encourage our successful applications as well as to encourage us to think in long-term kinds of ways and to have a better appreciation for our history.
And so this is the.
The first time that we're having these awards, and we'll continue to have awards like this in the future.

Best Paper Award was selected by a subcommittee led by Jude Shavlik, who was the program chair 10 years ago and Lianbo 2.

And the authors were noted notified.

But in his absence, Judas agreed to say just a few words about both the paper and its perspective.
So I'll turn things over to you.
